content.rendered:
As a school district, our staff is here to help your student transition to Maple Avenue Middle School for sixth grade.  Our school offers a breadth of counseling services for students in grades 6 through 8 to help them have a great start to middle school. Please see the resources below for helpful information.

Important Forms

  • Fine Arts & Electives Form
  • High School Course Selection Form
